A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall decent movie as a Disneyfied version of Star Wars. As a Star Wars movie in the scheme of 40 years of history didn’t thrill me too much. Hated the Leia scene. Hated how they wrote Luke. Hated the whole “let the past die” message. Hope JJ Abrams fills in some holes left from Force Awakens. Love the Porgs.
